languages.text: {n}В руке вашего спутника — вокс, из которого доносится ваш собственный голос:{/n} "Нет причины волноваться! Я и проктор занимаемся проверками бумаг... вместе с губернатором. Я вернусь, когда мы закончим..." {n}Резкий щелчок дает понять, что с той стороны связь прервалась.{/n}

{n}The vox in your companion's hand is speaking in your own voice:{/n} "There is no need for concern! The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В руке вашего спутника — вокс, из которого доносится ваш собственный голос:{/n} "Нет причины волноваться! Я и проктор занимаемся проверками бумаг... вместе с губернатором. Я вернусь, когда мы закончим..." {n}Резкий щелчок дает понять, что с той стороны связь прервалась.{/n}

The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}
{n}You see your retinue quarrelling with the guards. Judging by the raised voices and hands on weapons, the disagreement is about to tip over into violence.{/n}

{n}The vox in your companion's hand is speaking in your own voice:{/n} "There is no need for concern! The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

{n}The vox in your companion's hand is speaking in your own voice:{/n} "There is no need for concern! The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

languages.text: {n}此刻，你同伴手中的音阵装置中传来了你自己的声音。{/n}“没必要担心我们！我和监察官正在检查那些文件……和总督一起检查。等这边的事情忙完之后，我马上就回来……”{n}随后，音阵装置传来了响亮的咔哒声，通话被切断了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox in your companion's hand is speaking in your own voice:{/n} "There is no need for concern! The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}此刻，你同伴手中的音阵装置中传来了你自己的声音。{/n}“没必要担心我们！我和监察官正在检查那些文件……和总督一起检查。等这边的事情忙完之后，我马上就回来……”{n}随后，音阵装置传来了响亮的咔哒声，通话被切断了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El voco que tu acompañante lleva en la mano habla con tu voz:{/n} «¡No hay nada por lo que preocuparse! El Procurador y yo estamos examinando los documentos... junto con el gobernador. Volveré en cuanto terminemos aquí...». {n}Un profundo chasquido indica que la conexión se ha cortado en el otro extremo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox in your companion's hand is speaking in your own voice:{/n} "There is no need for concern! The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco que tu acompañante lleva en la mano habla con tu voz:{/n} «¡No hay nada por lo que preocuparse! El Procurador y yo estamos examinando los documentos... junto con el gobernador. Volveré en cuanto terminemos aquí...». {n}Un profundo chasquido indica que la conexión se ha cortado en el otro extremo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yoldaşının elindeki vokstan kendi sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Endişelenmeye gerek yok! Üsteğmen ve ben, valiyle birlikte belgeleri inceliyoruz. İşimiz biter bitmez döneceğim..." {n}Karşı tarafın bağlantıyı kestiğini gösteren yüksek bir tıklama sesi duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox in your companion's hand is speaking in your own voice:{/n} "There is no need for concern! The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yoldaşının elindeki vokstan kendi sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Endişelenmeye gerek yok! Üsteğmen ve ben, valiyle birlikte belgeleri inceliyoruz. İşimiz biter bitmez döneceğim..." {n}Karşı tarafın bağlantıyı kestiğini gösteren yüksek bir tıklama sesi duyuluyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの仲間の手にあるヴォックスから、あなた自身の声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「ご心配には及びません！代理人と私は文書の精査中です…総督と共に。こちらが片付き次第、すぐに戻ります…」{n}大きなクリック音が鳴り、相手側が通信を切ったことがわかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox in your companion's hand is speaking in your own voice:{/n} "There is no need for concern! The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの仲間の手にあるヴォックスから、あなた自身の声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「ご心配には及びません！代理人と私は文書の精査中です…総督と共に。こちらが片付き次第、すぐに戻ります…」{n}大きなクリック音が鳴り、相手側が通信を切ったことがわかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entre leurs mains, le vox explique dans une voix semblable à la vôtre :{/n} « N'ayez crainte ! Le proctor et moi sommes en train d'examiner les documents... avec le gouverneur. Je vous rejoindrai dès que nous en aurons terminé... » {n}Un cliquetis se fait entendre, indiquant que l'interlocuteur a mis fin à l'échange.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox in your companion's hand is speaking in your own voice:{/n} "There is no need for concern! The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre leurs mains, le vox explique dans une voix semblable à la vôtre :{/n} « N'ayez crainte ! Le proctor et moi sommes en train d'examiner les documents... avec le gouverneur. Je vous rejoindrai dès que nous en aurons terminé... » {n}Un cliquetis se fait entendre, indiquant que l'interlocuteur a mis fin à l'échange.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aus dem Vox in der Hand deines Gefährten ertönt deine eigene Stimme:{/n} "Es besteht kein Grund zur Sorge! Ich werte mit dem Proktor bereits die Dokumente aus ... gemeinsam mit dem Gouverneur. Ich kehre zurück, sobald wir hier fertig sind ..." {n}Ein lautes Klicken verrät dir, dass die andere Seite die Verbindung getrennt hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox in your companion's hand is speaking in your own voice:{/n} "There is no need for concern! The Proctor and I are in the middle of examining the documents... together with the governor. I will be back as soon as we are done here..." {n}There is a loud click, indicating that the other side has cut the connection.{/n}

Ich werte mit dem Proktor bereits die Dokumente aus ... gemeinsam mit dem Gouverneur. Ich kehre zurück, sobald wir hier fertig sind ..." {n}Ein lautes Klicken verrät dir, dass die andere Seite die Verbindung getrennt hat.{/n}
